javadoc:
Manages an array of lists of ints. It provides methods for
 adding, deleting, and retrieving int values for specific lists.

methods.javadoc:
Constructor
@param numLists initial number of lists.
methods.name: <init>
add
methods.comment: Add a value to the front of the list indexed by listID.

params.name: listID
params.comment: specifies which list the value is to be added.

params.name: value
params.comment: the value to be added to the list.

methods.name: append
methods.comment: Add a value to the back of the list indexed by listID.

params.name: listID
params.comment: specifies which list the value is to be appended.

params.name: value
params.comment: the value to be added to the linked list.

methods.name: remove
methods.comment: Remove the value from the list indexed by listID.

params.name: listID
params.comment: specifies from which list to remove the value.

params.name: value
params.comment: the value to remove removed from the specified list.

methods.name: removeAll
methods.comment: Remove all values from a specified list.

params.name: listID
params.comment: the id of the list to be cleared.

methods.name: contains
methods.comment: Returns true if the value exists in the specified list.

params.name: listID
params.comment: the id of the list to check for the value.

params.name: value
params.comment: the value to searched for in the given list.

methods.name: getCount
methods.comment: Get the number of values in the specified list.

params.name: listID
params.comment: the id of the list for which to get the number of values.

methods.name: get
methods.comment: Get list of values stored in the specified list.

params.name: listID
params.comment: the id of the list to get values for.

methods.javadoc:
Increase the number of lists.
@param numLists the new number of lists.
methods.name: growNumLists

methods.javadoc: Removes all values from all lists.
methods.name: clear
methods.comment: Removes all values from all lists.

methods.javadoc: Increase the capacity for the linked list of values.
methods.name: grow
methods.comment: Increase the capacity for the linked list of values.

methods.javadoc: Find the index of the value in the list specified by listID.
methods.name: findIndex
methods.comment: Find the index of the value in the list specified by listID.

name: IntIntIndexedList
comment:
Manages an array of lists of ints. It provides methods for
 adding, deleting, and retrieving int values for specific lists.
